pullRequest.title: feat: new UDFs for array max/min/sort
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Three new UDFs for array manipulation:

array_min
array_max
array_sort

Docs updated.
Testing done
Accompanying unit and QTT tests added.

+Array entries are compared according to their natural sort order, which sorts the various data-types per the following examples:
